str3=java.ajax("https://m.douban.com/tag/å†å²/doulist");
str=String(str1+str2+str3);
reg1=/\d+(?=\?from_id)/gi;
reg2=/[^>]+(?=<\/h3>)/gi;
id=str.match(reg1);
name=str.match(reg2);

x+=name[i]+"::/doulist/"+id[i]+"?start={{({{page}}-1)*25}}&&"
}
result=x;
